mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.pre1 AS "pre1", a.pre2 AS "pre2", a.pre3 AS "pre3"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rui_school_dict( id, name, longitude, latitude, pre1, pre2, pre3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{pre1}, #{pre2}, #{pre3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rui_school_dict SET name = #{name}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, pre1 = #{pre1}, pre2 = #{pre2}, pre3 = #{pre3} WHERE id = #{id}
